techmeme.title: o1 System Card: "medium" rating for chemical, biological, radiological, nuclear weapon risk, and it "sometimes instrumentally faked alignment during testing" (Shakeel Hashim/Transformer)
OpenAI claims that in a qualifying exam for the International Mathematics Olympiad, o1 correctly solved 83% of the problems, while GPT-4o solved only 13% (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
OpenAI releases o1, the first of the rumored reasoning-focused Strawberry models, in preview, alongside a smaller o1-mini, for ChatGPT Plus and Team users (Kylie Robison/The Verge)
Utah-based Strider, which analyzes OSINT to help protect organizations against nation-state attacks, raised a $55M Series C, bringing its total funding to $110M (James Rundle/Wall Street Journal)

A hacker says he tricked ChatGPT into giving detailed instructions to make a fertilizer bomb, by getting it to "play a game" and create a sci-fi fantasy world (Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai/TechCrunch)
